resources.string: There\'s no item in the listview.
There\'s no item in the gridview.

string-array.name: Desc
string-array.item: An American Ambassador is killed during an attack at a U.S. compound in Libya as a security team struggles to make sense out of the chaos.
Four waves of increasingly deadly alien attacks have left most of Earth decimated. Cassie is on the run, desperately trying to save her younger brother.
When Callum Lynch (Michael Fassbender) explores the memories of his ancestor Aguilar and gains the skills of a Master Assassin
Wearing the actions of Superman left unchecked, Batman takes on Superman, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero the world really needs.
Political interference in the Avengers\' activities causes a rift between former allies Captain America and Iron Man.
A former Special Forces operative turned mercenary is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers and adopts the alter ego Deadpool.
A woman goes into the Suicide Forest to find her twin sister, which she is informed by paranormal forces.
Rebels set out on a mission to steal the plans for the Death Star.
A secret government agency recruits imprisoned supervillains to execute dangerous black ops missions in exchange for clemency.
With the emergence of the world's first mutant, Apocalypse, the X-Men must unite to defeat his extinction level plan.
